The claim is based on a statistic from a: S. Treasury Department's Office of Tax Analysis.
The statistic states that business owner: 1 million in adjusted gross income received 41 percent of business income, which represents earnings, not individuals.
When looking specifically at small busin: individuals with more than $1 million in income received between 14 percent and 18 percent of small business income and represent 1 percent of small business owners.
